alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Kingsbury; Lake; Minnehaha; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 9:16AM MST until February 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Kingsbury, Brookings, Lake, Moody and Minnehaha Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rapidly falling temperatures Tuesday evening and overnight could lead to flash freezing conditions on area roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
